charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) - FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM AND AMMUNITION(1)

charges.charge_disposition: ORIGINAL: The deft. is hereby committed to the custody of the USBOP to be imprisoned for a total term of 270 months; Upon release from imprisoned, the deft shall be on supervised release for a term of 60 months with the special condition that deft. participate in drug testing and, if appropriate, treatment. S/A .00 is due immediately. AMENDED: The defendant's previously imposed sentence of imprisonment on 4/3/02 is reduced to 228 months.
